room_title: Escape room "Attic Society Chapter 2" by Escape Expert in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: I was skeptical as to what this experience would be like but I HAD SO MUCH FUN!!!! I went with my co-workers and we did the attic room which has a 40% escape rate; we solved it with just over 2 minutes to go. The owners are so lovely and they really give you all the tools you need to be successful if you listen and implement them. I HIGHLY, HIGHLY recommend Escape Expert for groups, corporate events, etc!!!

room_title: Escape room "Attic Society Chapter 2" by Escape Expert in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: This is creativity on crack! I was amazed at the imagination behind these rooms. It will truly challenge you. This is hands down the best escape room I've ever done...and it's in my own backyard!

room_title: Escape room "Attic Society Chapter 2" by Escape Expert in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Went with my boyfriend as an anniversary trip. We were paired with another group in the attic room. The puzzle was challenging but not frustratingly impossible. We were so close to finishing but unfortunately we didn't. Definitely we would do again.

room_title: Escape room "Attic Society Chapter 2" by Escape Expert in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: We took all four of my kids ages 6, 11,12 & 15 and had a great time figuring out the clues. It was fun to see them all work together - even though we didn't solve the puzzle in time! We will definitely go back again!!!

room_title: Escape room "Attic Society Chapter 2" by Escape Expert in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: if you're looking for an fun way to bring your family together, look no further. Escape Expert was soooooo much fun. We can't wait to go back. The owner was hilarious and so friendly. We will definitely go back.
